law.text:
A septic system or a well that functions in a deficient manner shall be assessed to the owner of the real property on which it is located on the basis of the deficiency, if:
the owner of the real property:
notifies the supervisor; and
states that the condition affects the value of the real property; and
the supervisor considers that the deficiency affects the value of the real property.
